abstract: Tide, the biggest detergent brand in America — sold by the biggest advertiser in America — will appear for the first time on the biggest day for advertising in America.
snippet: Tide, the biggest detergent brand in America — sold by the biggest advertiser in America — will appear for the first time on the biggest day for advertising in America.
lead_paragraph: THEY say time and tide wait for no man, but Tide has waited a long time to be advertised on the Super Bowl. Soon, Tide, the biggest detergent brand in America  sold by the biggest advertiser in America  will appear for the first time on the biggest day for advertising in America.

headline.main: Tide to Make Its Super Bowl Debut
headline.print_headline: Tide to Make Its Super Bowl Debut
